entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
